properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 7:18AM CST until January 18 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Fort Worth TX
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a Flood
Warning for the following areas in Texas...

Elm Fork Trinity River Near Carrollton Affecting Dallas County
Denton Creek Near Justin Affecting Denton County
Trinity River At Dallas Affecting Dallas County

The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Denton Creek Near Justin.
* from this evening to Saturday afternoon...Or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 0700 AM Thursday the stage was 5.80 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river should rise above flood stage by Thursday
evening and continue to rise to a crest near 12 feet by late
Friday morning due to expected rainfall. The river should fall
below flood stage by Saturday
after midnight.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Stay tuned to NOAA All Hazards Radio for the latest river forecasts.
